title: Grand WordPress meetup kickstart ahead of WordCamp Islamabad 2025
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP):The vibrant and growing Word Press community in Pakistan is set to kickstart the journey toward Word Camp Islamabad 2025 with a Grand Meetup on Saturday, June 14, 2025, from 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM at Innovista Rawal, Main Defence Avenue, DHA Phase 1, Islamabad.
This inclusive event is open to everyone involved in the WordPress ecosystem—including bloggers, developers, designers, freelancers, digital marketers, business owners, and students.
The Grand Meetup marks the beginning of the early planning phase for WordCamp Islamabad 2025, which aspires to be a dynamic, community-driven conference focused on learning, collaboration, and open-source growth.
“The Grand Meetup is our first step toward creating a meaningful WordCamp for everyone,” said Muhammad Kashif, one of the event organizers while talking to APP. “We want to involve the entire community right from the beginning to ensure the event is inclusive and impactful.”
Co-organizer Tahir Shahzad added, “We’re bringing together voices from across the WordPress ecosystem to help shape an event that reflects the true spirit of community, learning, and collaboration.”
According to the highlights of the Grand Meetup, to connect with fellow WordPress users and professionals from diverse backgrounds, share your insights and ideas to contribute to the planning of WordCamp Islamabad 2025.
It also included Inspiration and Learning, gain knowledge, inspire others, and explore ways to contribute to Pakistan’s growing digital landscape. Snacks & Swag
Enjoy light refreshments and receive exclusive WordPress goodies.
Whether you are a seasoned WordPress professional or just starting out in blogging or web development, your presence and input are highly valued.
It is worth mentioning here that WordPress Meetups are informal, community-led gatherings designed to share knowledge, support learning, and foster collaboration. Open to all experience levels, they provide a welcoming environment for enthusiasts and professionals alike.
WordCamps are larger, community-organized conferences held globally that focus on all things WordPress. These events typically include speaker sessions, workshops, and networking activities aimed at building skills and forging meaningful connections.
The WordPress community in Pakistan has experienced remarkable growth, and events like these play a crucial role in uniting talent, ideas, and innovation across the country.
